Detailed Description

Interface for monitoring the state of an application service.

See Delegate and Context::bindService() for more information.

Like many callbacks from the system, the methods on this class are called from the main thread of your process.

virtual void gaia::core::DelegateConnection::onServiceConnected ( gaia::core::ComponentName *  className,
gaia::core::IBinder *  delegate 
) [pure virtual]

Called when a connection to the Delegate has been established, with the IBinder of the communication channel to the delegate.

Parameters:
nameThe concrete component name of the delegate that has been connected.
serviceThe IBinder of the Delegate's communication channel, which you can now make calls on.
virtual void gaia::core::DelegateConnection::onServiceDisconnected ( gaia::core::ComponentName *  className) [pure virtual]

Called when a connection to the Delegate has been lost.

This typically happens when the process hosting the delegate has crashed or been killed. This does not remove the DelegateConnection itself -- this binding to the delegate will remain active, and you will receive a call to onServiceConnected when the Service is next running.

Parameters:
nameThe concrete component name of the delegate whose connection has been lost.
